data.text:
John Wilding Arundel Geare1

M, #517101

Last Edited=30 Dec 2014

John Wilding Arundel Geare is the son of Edward Arundel Geare.2 He married Winifred Mordaunt, daughter of Sir Charles Mordaunt, 10th Bt. and Mary Louisa Cholmondeley, on 31 January 1923.1

He lived at Blarich, Rogart, Sutherland, Scotland.1

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 2774. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

[S37] BP2003. [S37]

Anne Tritton1

F, #517102, b. 29 January 1912, d. 1980

Last Edited=16 Mar 2019

Anne Tritton was born on 29 January 1912.2 She was the daughter of Arthur Francis Tritton and Beatrice May Laurence.2 She married Sir Nigel John Mordaunt, 13th Bt., son of Eustace Charles Mordaunt and Cicely Marion Tubb, on 7 February 1938.2 She died in 1980.2

From 7 February 1938, her married name became Mordaunt.

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 2774. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

[S37] BP2003. [S37]

David Arthur John Mordaunt1

M, #517103, b. 17 December 1942

Last Edited=30 Dec 2014

Consanguinity Index=0.0%

David Arthur John Mordaunt was born on 17 December 1942.1 He is the son of Sir Nigel John Mordaunt, 13th Bt. and Anne Tritton.2 He married Elizabeth Aske Luke, daughter of William Edgel Luke, on 14 January 1969.1

He was educated at Radley College, Abingdon, Oxfordshire, England.1

Children of David Arthur John Mordaunt and Elizabeth Aske Luke

Katherine Elizabeth Aske Mordaunt2 b. 7 Jul 1970

Alexandra Caroline Aske Mordaunt2 b. 27 Oct 1972

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 2774. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

[S37] BP2003. [S37]

Elizabeth Aske Luke1

F, #517105

Last Edited=30 Dec 2014

Elizabeth Aske Luke is the daughter of William Edgel Luke.2 She married David Arthur John Mordaunt, son of Sir Nigel John Mordaunt, 13th Bt. and Anne Tritton, on 14 January 1969.1

From 14 January 1969, her married name became Mordaunt.

Children of Elizabeth Aske Luke and David Arthur John Mordaunt

Alexandra Caroline Aske Mordaunt2 b. 27 Oct 1972

Charles Erskine1

M, #517108, d. 9 March 1811

Last Edited=31 Dec 2011

Charles Erskine was the son of Colin Erskine.1 He died on 9 March 1811.1

He held the office of Cardinal.1
